meanings.definition: A male sex hormone produced primarily in the testes.
meanings.sent1: Testosterones play a crucial role in male development.
meanings.sent2: Doctors can measure testosterones levels in the blood.
meanings.sent3: The testosterones in his body were like little workers building muscles.
meanings.sent4: His confidence seemed to rise with the surge of testosterones.
meanings.sent5: The power of testosterones is evident in the growth of facial hair.

meanings.definition: The primary male sex hormone responsible for the development of male reproductive tissues and characteristics.
meanings.sent1: Proper levels of testosterones are essential for male health.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes abuse testosterones to enhance performance.
meanings.sent3: The testosterones in the gym seemed to be lifting weights themselves!
meanings.sent4: His determination was like a wave of testosterones, driving him forward.
meanings.sent5: The influence of testosterones on behavior is well-documented.
